attributes.action: Task JARIC to help find the whereabouts of Madeleine McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Madeleine McCann has been missing since the 3rd May 2007 and we believe that British Intelligence can help to find out what happened to her.

JARIC have the ability to both to overfly the target area of Praia da Luz immediately and collect any aerial imagery of it that can be found, dating back to May 2, 2007 (the day before Madeleine went missing), as well as any images that may be extant.

It should also be instructed to examine any satellite images of the target zone for the period after May 2nd. It is perfectly possible that the European Commission’s satellites which track fishing boats may also be able to shed light on Madeleine’s fate.

We urge Prime Minister Gordon Brown to instruct JARIC to carry out immediate intelligence gathering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
